metadata.name: My mona lisa
metadata.description:
Once I had to live with the nomads for a month for a photography project, they had a little girl named Fatima.
Fatima always worked with her mother, she had beautiful eyes, Fatemeh lived in the mountains since she was a child and was always moving with her family. One morning when I woke up, I saw Fatima, I quickly took the camera and took picture from her.
 I took a photo, the first bright light on Fatima's hair, I like this portrait very much and that is why I named this photo my Mona Lisa. She talks to me with her eyes.
Today, about ten years have passed since this photo and I do not know where Fatima is and what she is doing, but I hope to see her again one day and take a photo of her.
